amendment.description: To require a report on the High Altitude Aviation Training Site in Eagle County, Colorado.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4220 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4220 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Salazar. (consideration: CR S6346-6366) To require a report on the High Altitude Aviation Training Site in Eagle County, Colorado.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4220 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4220 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Salazar.
